summary: This is a standard Office of the Inspector General (OIG) interview waiver form used to document that an employee is voluntarily providing information as part of an investigation. The form includes warnings, assurances, and signature blocks for the OIG special agent and the witness/employee.

persons.name: Name of Witness
persons.context: The employee/witness is being asked to voluntarily provide information as part of an OIG investigation and is signing the waiver form.

persons.name: Employee's Name
persons.context: The employee is the subject of the form, agreeing to provide voluntary information for the OIG investigation.

keyFacts: The document is a voluntary interview waiver form from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG).
The investigation pertains to alleged false statements, perjury, and obstruction of justice.
The employee/witness is assured that the interview is voluntary and no disciplinary action will be taken if they choose not to answer.
Any statement provided may be used as evidence in future criminal or disciplinary proceedings.
The form requires signatures from both the OIG Special Agent and the employee/witness.
